metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36423 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Arm Mbed TLS before 2.23.0. A remote attackercan recover plaintext because a certain Lucky 13 countermeasure doesn'tproperly consider the case of a hardware accelerator.

criterions.comment: mbedtls: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
